verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Jesus is the Lord, and He lives in me I’m as satisfied as I can be. Oh, hallelujah! Oh, hallelujah! Jesus lives in me.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}All this world is vanity Jesus is the one reality. Oh, hallelujah! Oh, hallelujah! Jesus lives in me.{/lang-eng}
